(Original) Well worth the visit! Beautiful property inside and out. Even just outside is a great atmosphere with many people enjoying the park. The integrated ticket includes the main house, the ‚Äúowl house‚Äù, and a gallery. The owl house is far more interesting from the outside and the exhibit is not much to see either.

topComments.author: Kiara Di Fede

A visita √† gruta artificial, uma verdadeira porta do tempo, completa o passeio. O custo do bilhete para este site √© de 4‚Ç¨, n√£o existem audioguias dispon√≠veis de momento, mas podem ser alugados para o casino dos pr√≠ncipes e para a casinha das corujas, ambos fascinantes.
